name: Planet Defender (itch) (budy_paco)
description:
Planet Defender is a first person shooter where you are equipped with a rife/shotgun hybrid weapon and must destroy the robot invaders on multiple planets. Each planet has it's own gravity platform which will shift your gravity towards the next planet. This game was created as a final project for CSE 389: "Game Design and Implementation" at Miami University in Spring 2021.

Controls:

WASD: Move Around

Left Click: Shoot

E: Switch Weapon
